thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Crystal

author: Crystal
title: Crystal
text: The first class expedition team, first class hotel crews, first class restaurant...It's a nice surprise! I thought going to Antarctica meant going tough, on your own for many things. But no, these great people really made me feel a lux vacation as well as adventurous.And those seminars while we were at the sea? I learned s much about the environment, our planet, antarctica animals, iceology, you name it. Great bonus! Highly recommended!
